content:
Name Pavit Chhabra
Linkedin Profile (if interested) https://www.linkedin.com/in/pavitchhabrawork/
CGPA at the time of Selection (if interested) 8.48
Company Appeared For Cisco
Placement Profile SDE
Mode of Online Assessment Online
Online Assessment Difficulty (out of 5) 2
Online Assessment Round Questions Expand Can’t recall much but there were 3 questions, one was based on binary search and was similar to aggressive cows, one was simple greedy and last one was mcm dp. Mode of Interview(s) Online
Number of Interview Rounds 3
Interview Experience Expand First round was completely based on CV/Resume and was just project discussion based on design decisions taken etc. There were also some questions from CS Core. Second round had one DSA question, median of two sorted arrays. There was also discussion on CV in this round. The third round was just 15 mins long ETR round with Introduction and discussion about being able to relocate to Bengaluru and Stipend. Level of Difficulty of Interview(s) 2
Tips/Sources for Interview Preparation Expand Be thorough with your projects and CV in general. Have basic DSA Knowledge, Striver’s sheet is more than enough. Were Society Position of Responsibility given any Importance? No
Did the Interviewer(s) Focus on asking questions from CV/Resume Yes
Any other relevant information was selected for a summer Internship.
summary: Read about my interview experience at Cisco
title: Pavit Chhabra - Cisco
